<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3153</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">General Knowledge Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemeinwissen-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de la Connaissance Générale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Do Conhecimento Geral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Conoscenza Generale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων γνώσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso Del Conocimiento General</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a teacher guideline for setting up a general knowledge quiz for their class on any topic</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">general knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Lehrerkorrekturlinie für einen 
Allgemeinwissenquiz für ihre Kategorie auf jedem möglichem Thema 
aufstellen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une directive de professeur pour installer 
un jeu de la connaissance générale pour leur classe sur n'importe 
quel sujet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um guideline do professor para ajustar 
acima um quiz do conhecimento geral para sua classe em todo o tópico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida di riferimento dell'insegnante 
per l'installazione del quiz di conoscenza generale per il loro codice
categoria su tutto il soggetto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια οδηγία δασκάλων για την οργάνωση ενός
γενικού διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων γνώσης για την κλάση τους σε 
οποιοδήποτε θέμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía de consulta del profesor para 
setting-up un concurso del conocimiento general para su clase en 
cualquier asunto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemeinwissen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la connaissance générale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conhecimento geral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conoscenza generale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενική γνώση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conocimiento general</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">concurso</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
